name: The Coup Attempt
description: A captain is plotting to overthrow Tony with Junior's backing.
context: Richie Aprile, a newly released captain with old-school credentials, is openly disrespecting you and building alliances. You've learned he's been meeting with Junior to plan a coup against you. Your sister Janice is dating Richie, complicating matters. The captains are watching to see how you handle this direct threat to your leadership.
prompt: Richie is coming for your throne. Your sister is in his bed. Your uncle is backing him. How do you handle this?
